snippet.title: Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory | Welcome to Alpha Complex [US]
snippet.description:
Friend Computer welcomes you to the Alpha Complex, you are now appointed as a Troubleshooter with Red clearance!

Your mission will be to unearth traitors of Alpha Complex and to neutralise them. Friend Computer will definitely maybe reward you for your loyalty!

Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory: a darkly humorous CRPG, adapted from the tabletop role-playing game created by Dan Gelber, Greg Costikyan and Eric Goldberg.

The game will be released on PC and consoles in 2019, when Friend Computer feels like it.

-------------------------------

To gain more credentials for Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory, you must follow the Friend Computer on:
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/PlayParanoia
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/PlayParanoia

-------------------------------

We also authorize you to follow Bigben Games on: 
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/bigbengames
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/Bigben_Games
